sentences.en: Academics, students and alumni of the Business School congratulate the winning team.
sentences.cn: 得奖学生接受工商管理学院的老师 、 同学和校友恭贺.

sentences.en: Alumni tell why the event is such a great place reconnect.
sentences.cn: 前受奖人分享为何这是很棒的再接触机会.

sentences.en: Facts: No link to press several Danyang Experimental Elementary School alumni.
sentences.cn: 事实: 记者辗转联系到了几位丹阳实验小学的校友.

sentences.en: Helping alumni keep in touch is a give - and - take process.
sentences.cn: 协助校友与学校产生连结可说是互利的过程.

sentences.en: How can you encourage alumni from Foundation programs to join Rotary?
sentences.cn: 你能如何鼓励扶轮基金会计画来的前受奖人参与扶轮?

sentences.en: I write thank - you note to alumni who helped me out.
sentences.cn: 给帮助我的校友写谢函.

sentences.en: If your former school has an alumni group, get involved.
sentences.cn: 如果你以前的学校有校友会, 那就加入吧.

sentences.en: Most of the previous winners played pivotal roles in their alumni associations.
sentences.cn: 过去荣膺此奖项的校友,大多数都在各校友会中扮演过重要的角色.

sentences.en: My alumni and alumna are present at my birthday party.
sentences.cn: 我的男校友和女校友都出席了我的生日聚会.

sentences.en: Perhaps the best measure is the extraordinary success of our alumni.
sentences.cn: 也许最好的标尺是我们的校友的非凡成功.

sentences.en: Raymond: Just got my alumni magazine from Gordanema College.
sentences.cn: 雷蒙德: 我刚刚收到戈达涅马学院寄来的校友杂志.

sentences.en: School alumni employ students during summer and winter breaks.
sentences.cn: 在寒暑假期间,学生可以到校友办的公司打工.

sentences.en: Several alumni have agreed to help raise money.
sentences.cn: 几位校友已同意帮助筹资.

sentences.en: Should you forget, there is an alumni association to remind you.
sentences.cn: 即使你忘了这一点, 校友会也会来提醒你.

sentences.en: The college just finished building a new alumni building.
sentences.cn: 这所大学刚建成了一座校友大楼.

trans.tran_cn: （男）校友，（男）毕业生，校友( alumnus的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: the former students of a school, college etc
